2024.title: Consensus 2024 in Austin
2024.description: CoinDesk held Consensus May 29‑31, 2024 in Austin, the largest gathering of blockchain developers, investors, brands, and policymakers.

2024.title: MiCA & digital bond on Ethereum
2024.description: 2024 featured Europe's MiCA regulation emerging, alongside Société Générale issuing a digital green bond on Ethereum.

2024.title: Blockchain Expo Global 2024
2024.description: Held in late 2024, this enterprise-grade expo featured 500+ speakers focused on blockchain, crypto‑assets and cybersecurity.
